name: 1 step forward, 1 step back. 12 May 2021.
description: A walking score of 700 steps due east, 870 frames. || video loop, 29s, silent, 2160x2160 pixels, 2021. || Part of the MAY2021 series by Ian Winters, a daily video meditation for NFT during May 2021. || IG: ianwinters.vide.artist || hen.link/ianwinters || @info_iw || Epigram: Coming east we left the animals || pelican beaver osprey muskrat and snake (Jean Valentine)
